nodes.text: Krull was a male individual who served as a captain in the New Republic Defense Fleet two years after the Battle of Jakku. He was stationed aboard the flagship Tribulan Vort in a blockade of the sector where Substation Grimdock was located when a crew including Lando Calrissian and Han Solo were leaving the prison moon aboard the freighter Vermillion. He initially stopped the group from passing, but Leia Organa contacted him via hologram and instructed him to let them through.
